refnamediv.refpurpose: finds a circuit or the rank function in a directed graph

listitem.para: row vector of integer numbers of the arcs of the circuit if it exists
row vector of rank function if there is no circuit

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A cycle of a graph g, also called a circuit, is a subset of the edges of g that forms a path such that the first node of the path corresponds to the last.
circuit tries to find surch a circuit for the directed graph g. It returns the circuit p as a row vector of the corresponding arc numbers if it exists and it returns the empty vector [] otherwise.
If the graph has no circuit, the rank function is returned in r, otherwise its value is the empty vector [].
